 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַהּ‎</span>] **verb** only **Hithpalpel** ==linger, tarry== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slow walk, delay*** (<abbr title="transliteration"><u>†am.</u></abbr>)); — 

**Hithpalpel** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.60|Ps 119:60]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמְהוּ‎</span> [[Judg.19.8|Judg 19:8]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ‎</span> [[Gen.43.10|Gen 43:10]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְמַהְמַהּ‎</span> [[Hab.2.3|Hab 2:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְמ‎</span> [[Gen.19.16|Gen 19:16]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמְהוּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִתְמַחְמֵהַּ‎</span> [[Exod.12.39|Exod 12:39]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְמַהְמֵהַּ‎</span> [[2Sam.15.28|2Sam 15:28]] — ***linger, tarry, wait***, of person, [[Gen.19.16|Gen 19:16]]; [[Gen.43.10|Gen 43:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.12.39|Exod 12:39]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.3.26|Judg 3:26]]; [[Judg.19.8|Judg 19:8]]; [[2Sam.15.28|2Sam 15:28]]; [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]]; [[Ps.119.60|Ps 119:60]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span>, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַ֫שְׁתִּי‎</span>); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָזוֺן‎</span> ***vision*** [[Hab.2.3|Hab 2:3]] 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְהוּמָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הום‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְהוּמָן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמן‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְהֵיטַבְאֵל‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יטב‎</span>.
